name: PROF. DR. MOHAMMAD OMAR FARUQ
details: State of the art technology and expertise combined with the support of our friendly staff, we strive each day to be the top healthcare provider, not only in Bangladesh but within the Asia-Pacific region.
docDetails: Prof Omar Faruq is the pioneer in Critical Care Medicine in Bangladesh who has started the first MD course in Critical Care Medicine in BIRDEM. He received his training in Medicine and allied branches in the US in mid 1970s. He passed American Board of Internal Medicine exams in 1982. He also passed American Board of Emergency Medicine in 1990. He was re-certified in American Board of Emergency Medicine in 2001.He did his FCPS in Medicine in 2006.Before joining United Hospital as Consultant General ICU, since 1996 he had been working at BIRDEM General Hospital, Dhaka.

name: DR. ASHIA ALI
details: State of the art technology and expertise combined with the support of our friendly staff, we strive each day to be the top healthcare provider, not only in Bangladesh but within the Asia-Pacific region.
docDetails: Dr. Ashia Ali did her graduation (MBBS) from Rangpur Medical College under University of Rajshahi in 1986. She did her Diploma in Anesthesia from University of Dhaka in 1998 and FCPS (Anesthesia) in 2003. She served in Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University in the department of Cardiothoracic Anesthesia for long 11 years from 2003 to 2014. Thereafter she joined Apollo Hospitals Dhaka (now Evercare Hospital) as Consultant Anesthesia & ICU and served there from 2014 till 2016. Before joining United Hospital, she served Asgar Ali Hospital as Consultant of Anesthesia & Pain Medicine from end 2016 till mid-2020.

name: DR. REYAN ANIS
details: State of the art technology and expertise combined with the support of our friendly staff, we strive each day to be the top healthcare provider, not only in Bangladesh but within the Asia-Pacific region.
docDetails: Dr. Reyan Anis, MRCP, one of the most renowned cardiologists of the country has joined United Hospital of the capital, where she is now seeing patients full time and performing cardiac procedures at Cath Lab.After graduating from Dhaka Medical College in 1985, Dr. Anis worked for just over a year at CMH in Dhaka before moving abroad. She completed a program in Internal Medicine from Edinburgh Postgraduate Institute of Medicine in the United Kingdom in 1989 before joining Scotland's Royal Infirmary, Edinburgh as a clinical trainee where she worked until obtaining her MRCP in 1991.In 1992 she returned to Bangladesh to begin her clinical fellowship in Cardiology at NICVD and upon completion joined the Cardiology department of BIRDEM in the middle of 1994. From 1995 to 1997 Dr. Anis practiced at Kings College Hospital of London in United Kingdom before returning to BIRDEM to serve as Associate Professor of Cardiology. Dr. Anis remained at BIRDEM until 2001 when she joined the DAB Cardiac Center, where she played a crucial role in establishing their CCU and Cath lab facilities in 2002 and spent a year there as their Cardiology Consultant. Dr. Anis practiced at ZH Sikder Women's Medical College & Hospital from 2003 to 2004 as a Senior Cardiology Consultant before joining Lab Aid Cardiac Hospital in 2004.In 2010, Dr. Reyan Anis was awarded a prestigious FRCP from the Royal College of Physicians, London.

docDetails: RIFLE serum creatinine and urine output criteria combined is superior to RIFLE serum creatinine criterion alone in predicting Acute Kidney Injuru (AKI) in critically ill patients: A prospective observational study:BSSCM volume 8, number 1, March 2020. Proud student of first ever batch of MD in Critical Care Medicine in Bangladesh.Treasurer and EC member in Bangladesh Society of Critical Care Medicine.Participant in 15th Emirates Critical Care Conference as a speaker in 2019

name: DR. ASHIS KUMAR BISWAS
details: State of the art technology and expertise combined with the support of our friendly staff, we strive each day to be the top healthcare provider, not only in Bangladesh but within the Asia-Pacific region.
docDetails: Dr. Ashis Kumar graduated (BDS) from Chittagong Medical College in 2005; He did his  MCPS in Dental Surgery from Bangladesh College of Physicians & Surgeons (BCPS) in 2010 and completed FCPS in Orthodontic and Dentofacial Orthopaedics from  Bangladesh College of Physicians & Surgeons (BCPS)  in 2012.Dr. Ashis Kumar worked in Udayan Dental College, Rajshahi as Assistant Professor and Head, Department of Orthodontics from October 2012 to April 2013. Thereafter he joined  as  Assistant Professor in Department of Orthodontics  of Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University, Dhaka (BSMMU)  in June 2013. He has more than 14 years clinical experience in Dental Surgery and Orthodontic. He is the member of Bangladesh Orthodontic Society.

name: DR. KAZI ALI HASSAN
details: State of the art technology and expertise combined with the support of our friendly staff, we strive each day to be the top healthcare provider, not only in Bangladesh but within the Asia-Pacific region.
docDetails: Obtained MBBS degree from Mymensingh Medical College under University of Dhaka in 1983.Completed M.Phil in Clinical Endocrinology from BIRDEM in 1989.Obtained his MRCP degree in Internal Medicine from Royal College of Physicians of UK, in 2003.Obtained FRCP from Royal College of Physicians of Edinburgh in 2016.Worked as a Consultant Endocrinologist for 12 years in King Fahad Specialist Hospital, Saudi Arabia from 1993 to 2005 and gained vast experience in treating patients with diabetes, thyroid diseases and other hormonal disorders

name: DR. SALINA AKTER

docDetails: She passed MBBS in 2008 from Faridpur Medical College under University of Dhaka. She did her MD in Nephrology from Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University (BSMMU) in 2016. She worked in Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University (BSMMU) from 2011 to 2016. Thereafter she joined in United Hospital as a specialist from 2016 till now.

name: DR. TANIA MAHBUB
details: State of the art technology and expertise combined with the support of our friendly staff, we strive each day to be the top healthcare provider, not only in Bangladesh but within the Asia-Pacific region.
docDetails: Dr. Tania Mahbub graduated (MBBS) from Sher-e-Bangla Medical College, Barisal under the University of Dhaka in 2001. She joined in Government job in 2005 and served in renowned Government tertiary care hospitals, notably in Dhaka Medical College Hospital, Sir Salimullah Medical College (Mitford) Hospital and Kurmitola General Hospital. She completed her four years of fellowship training in Medicine under BCPS and completed Doctor of Medicine (MD) in Nephrology from Dhaka Medical College in 2012.

docDetails: Has several publications in different journals, participated many seminars, symposiums. Coordinated and supervised training of post graduate students.He can perform all kinds of major and minor fracture surgeries and experienced in management of multiple fracture on the day of admission. He is the pioneer in modern day spine surgery in Bangladesh Army. He is also very keen to do the different kind of joint replacement surgeries (even with mega prosthesis)

docDetails: Obtained MBBS degree from Dhaka Medical College under University of Dhaka in 1983.Completed FCPS in Surgery from Bangladesh College of Physicians and Surgeons (BCPS) in 1990.Worked in National Health Service (NHS) of UK for four years during when he earned his FRCS from Royal College of Surgeons of England in 1993.Worked in Bangabandhu Sheikh Mujib Medical University (BSMMU) from 1997 to 1999 where he was an active member of the Renal Transplantation Team.Worked at Square Hospitals as Consultant Urology and Urological Surgeon for seven years and also worked at Apollo Hospitals Dhaka (now Evercare Hospital) as Senior Consultant for three years

name: DR. MD. ABDUL MABIN
details: State of the art technology and expertise combined with the support of our friendly staff, we strive each day to be the top healthcare provider, not only in Bangladesh but within the Asia-Pacific region.
docDetails: He has passed the FRCS Examination in June 1996. Since then he worked in neurosurgery for National Health services of UK at Western General Hospital, Edinburgh; Radcliff infirmary: University of oxford and Walsgrave Hospital, University of Warwick, UK. In 2003 he returned to Bangladesh to join Apollo Hospital Dhaka as Consultant Neurosurgeon . In 2007 he Joined United Hospital Dhaka as Consultant Neurosurgery and Director, Neuro Centre.

name: PROF. DR. S. M. G. KIBRIA
details: State of the art technology and expertise combined with the support of our friendly staff, we strive each day to be the top healthcare provider, not only in Bangladesh but within the Asia-Pacific region.
docDetails: Prof. Dr. S. M. G. Kibria is a renowned British Consultant Surgeon who has more than 34 years of experience in the field of General, Laparoscopic and Vascular Surgery in England. He graduated from Dhaka Medical College. He is one of the few surgeons in this subcontinent who obtained four FRCS degrees and also obtained his MSc (Research) degree in 2004 from The University of Leeds, England.After completing internship he went to England and worked for more than 34 years which includes 12 years as Full Time Consultant, General and Vascular Surgeon. He had been a Senior Clinical Tutor in the School of Clinical Medicine at Cambridge University School of Medicine. He is also an Examiner of the Surgical Royal Colleges, UK.
